website_summaries.verdict: Small, waterproof speakers with a great deal of sound output that cuts through the outside noises of boating.
pros: Durable construction for outdoors or marine use
The 6.5-inch diameter of the speakers allows for plenty of volume when combined with the amplifier
cons: Weatherproof exterior doesn't last long in some marine environments

customer_reviews.title: decent value
customer_reviews.text: Decent construction, appear that they will hold up, .....Installed two years ago now, and they're out in the elements a good part of the year, and are holding up so far. I treat them with no respect whatsoever, and can't really demand much from such an inexpensive option as a boat speaker, but so far they're earning a good reputation. Decent, not great, sound and apparently pretty robust construction!! A good value, they are. Update year three: Replaced original two speakers (not the Boss 3rd and 4th reviewed above) with the same Boss 6.5" and everything's working out fine. Appreciate the fact that the mounting hardware is stainless steel for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R DesRoches

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: The speakers sound OK which is what I was expecting for the price. It would have been nice to have spade connectors included. Waterproofing is from a gasket 3/4” back from the edge. Time will tell. Update-the speakers were installed on the outside of my Keystone 5th wheel. They were too deep by about 1/2” . I solved the problem by letting them stick out into a cabinet. See picture
customer_reviews.author: Moore

customer_reviews.title: For the price, they sound fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Mounted mine on the side of travel trailer in surface mounted pods. Not sure if they improve upon the bass of the speaker or not, but man do they pound pretty good. Hooked up to a regular pioneer radio they have great sound (read- not tinny) and honestly was going to buy the kickers and ended up on these because they look plain. I doubt anyone will steal boss speakers off of it in storage!
customer_reviews.author: Blain G

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me, the hole size on my boat was 5 inches the speaker needs a bigger hole. Also the spacing between the mounting holes was 4.3/4" where the Jensen speakers were 4 1/2". Could had maybe drilled new holes but opening up the 5" dia. hole to around 5.3 would of been to much work and mess... Having to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are a REPLACEMET for the same speakers that I bought three years ago. One of the original speakers failed. They sound very good on my boat so I bought another. The failure is a open circuit. Because of the sealed construction, they are unrepairable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Decent speakers Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product FOR THE PRICE. Sounds fine in the golf cart. I don’t think I would use these for the home theater but that is it what they are for anyway. For the price I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gary m singer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The tabs on the back for the spade connectors break off easy. Other than that a ok product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Duramax

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Speakers looked good, and installed easy, and the sound quality was great! They smoke the Pyle and the Blaupunkt speakers they replaced! Outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hill

customer_reviews.title: You get  what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. For some reason, sometimes that sound pretty good and sometimes they sound staticky or distorted. All connections from radio to speakers were properly check and are well connected. I’m not sure why it sounds decent sometimes and sounds horrible other times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need amazing sound you just can't get that for $25 but ...
customer_reviews.text: Ruggedly built plastic speaker should stand up to kicks where I have them placed. The sound is very bass heavy. Not much mids or treble. Maybe my tweeters aren't working? If you need amazing sound you just can't get that for $25 but I'm happy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ebsworth

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speakers for the money. Replaced Sony speakers in my boat with these. The sound quality is just as good with these speakers as the Sony that I replaced...at a considerable cheaper price! Too early to see how "waterproof " they are.
customer_reviews.author: Donald P.

customer_reviews.title: Decent speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat these for the price. Replaced a 20 yr old pair that was in our boat when we bought it and these work fine. They sound good at a decent volume. Fit the holes from the old speakers under the dash but the mounting screws were in a different location.
customer_reviews.author: mkool

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Install both in less then 5 minutes and sound great
customer_reviews.author: bradley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these speakers. They sound great on our pontoon.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Damron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying these speakers, the first set went into my airboat 6 years ago and worked perfectly, i have recently gotton a new boat hull and purchased my second set for the new hull, these speakers are easy to install, they look good and sound quality is excellent, i love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat speaker’s
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speaker for my boat. Easy to install and sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Zayas Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good A little big for old hole had to redrill screw holes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these loud and good quality sound on my boat
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these along with a new Boss receiver as replacement set for my boat that currently had Jensen speakers and Aquatronics receiver. They perform much better than the Jensen that came with the boat. I would not call them the best but very good sound for low dollar investment.
customer_reviews.author: jms

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these speakers expecting "ok" sound to replace the rotten speakers on my boat. I was very impressed with these speakers. I'm some what of an audiophile and was still impressed. Clear highs and pretty deep bass without distortion. I'd buy another set in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a setbof these about 3 years ago for one pontoon boat. They are still fine. This set is for another boat.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the OEM speakers on my '99 Chaparral with these and boy did it make a difference. The sound is loud and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sound great and look nice. Would buy again no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Sound good at first but I had one completely fail after ...
customer_reviews.text: These are alright. Sound good at first but I had one completely fail after 6 months or modest use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Whatcott

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out within a year. Granted I am on ...
customer_reviews.text: Crapped out within a year. Granted I am on the boat 2-3 times a week in saltwater but still, these died fast.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Felts

customer_reviews.title: Good for radio cooler
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but no bass. Made a radio cooler with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rene B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for the price. Fast shipping sound just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hay’s Music

customer_reviews.title: Matches the white on my boat!
customer_reviews.text: Though the cone is a little bit bigger than I expected. The color matched perfect and the it sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and soon will have 4 in my Boat.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Blown after 6 months?
customer_reviews.text: One of these speakers has a buzzing noise after very little use. Not abused, just used like a normal person and now 6 months later one of them sounds blown. I will augment this review after I see how customer service handles it. Update... took the speaker out and found the magnet was loose in the speaker. I drilled several 3/8 holes in the aera around the magnet then pumped it full of silicon. It sounds fine MW thatvyje magnet had something holding it from vibrating.
customer_reviews.author: Javan J Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding speaker and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing some 10 year old speakers on my pontoon. I also added 2 speakers. I found these and figured they were cheap enough so I purchased 4 of them. I live in extreme weather conditions from 90's in the summer to -30 in the winter so these need to take a beating. I just installed them and they are loud. I cannot turn my pioneer all the way to the max but pretty close. They sound clear and are worth the price. I did have to re-size the existing holes a little, no biggie to me used a jig saw and trimmed it. Cannot wait until I can hear them on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip J

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match to the other speakers in the boat. Easy install. Sound good for only using headunit power.
customer_reviews.author: Byron K. O.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speakers. Just installed in my center console. Hope they last but can't go wrong for the price. My head unit was a JVC 68.00 unit. For less than 100.00 total I really like the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Obviously a economical set..but seem adequately made. Sound is ok..no bass at all tho. Mostly large tweeter...just bought so I cannot tell you how they hold up yet
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not fit the existing hole described, but after installing it and making the hole bigger they work nice
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are hard to beat, they have quality sound at a really good price
customer_reviews.author: Rocky H

customer_reviews.title: A good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Great marine speakers for the price. Good sound quality and budget friendly the perfect combination
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Alamo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Look great and sound great! Bought for a cooler radio. For the price u can't beat it. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaf diablo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit but still a decent cheap speaker
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, workable marine speakers. Got these to replace the stock speakers in a 2000 340 Sundancer. Unfortunately, while the overall diameter was fine, the diameter of the base was too big to fit in the stock holes. I will use these for some other purpose though - probably an outdoor speaker system for my patio.
customer_reviews.author: BillP

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but had no wire or connectors
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but had no wire or connectors. Only been on a week so time will tell how long they last on salt water.
customer_reviews.author: Ldub

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems MR6W 180 Watt Per Pair, 6.5 Inch, Full Range, 2 Way Weatherproof Marine Speakers Sold in Pairs
product_meta.description: BOSS Audio MR6W 180 Watt (Per Pair), 6. 5 Inch, Full Range, 2 Way Weatherproof Marine Speakers (Sold in Pairs)
feature_bullets: Impedance: 4 Ohms, Frequency Response: 80 Hz - 20 kHz, Sensitivity: 89 dB
Cone: Polypropylene, Voice Coil: 1 Inch Aluminum
One 1 Inch Mylar Dome Tweeter Per Speaker
Dimensions: Depth 7. 5” x Width 7. 5” x Height 3. 4”, Weight Per Pair: 8. 8 Lbs.
